scripts.package:mac: cd dist/Mac; zip -r ../google-messages-mac_v$(npm -s run env echo '$npm_package_version').zip *
scripts.package:linux: cd dist/Linux; zip -r ../google-messages-linux_v$(npm -s run env echo '$npm_package_version').zip *
scripts.package:windows: cd dist/Windows; zip -r ../google-messages-windows_v$(npm -s run env echo '$npm_package_version').zip *
scripts.package:windows_tray: cd dist/Windows_Tray; zip -r ../google-messages-windows-tray_v$(npm -s run env echo '$npm_package_version').zip *
scripts.build:all: npm run clean:dist && npm run mac && npm run windows && npm run windows:tray && npm run linux
scripts.package:all: npm run clean:packages && npm run package:mac && npm run package:linux && npm run package:windows && npm run package:windows_tray
scripts.release: npm run build:all && npm run package:all
